meanings.definition: Speak irreverently about God or sacred things.
meanings.sent1: He blasphemes by disrespecting sacred beliefs.
meanings.sent2: She often blasphemes when discussing religious topics.
meanings.sent3: The comedian jokingly blasphemes about divine matters.
meanings.sent4: His words blaspheme the sanctity of the church.
meanings.sent5: The movie character's actions blaspheme against all that is holy.

meanings.sent1: The villain blasphemes with foul language.
meanings.sent2: They were shocked to hear him blaspheme during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to blaspheme in multiple languages.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to blaspheme the very essence of decency.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti on the wall blaspheming the church was quickly removed.
